Tucson puts an arm around Talon with a playful smile on his face.  It would=
 be his only moment of light heartedness.

" You're absolutely right, Talon=
 but it's a shame that CR chambers are only designed for one individual at =
a time."

He wispers quietly with a cat like grin on his face.  He then tur=
ns to Leo Prime, with an attentive nod.

"Nightshift and Rattrap were out l=
ooking for Cheetor together but, an unknown insectile force attacked them a=
nd in an effort to elude them, Nightshift spun out and collided with someth=
ing in the forest which caused extensive damage.  He should be in med bay n=
ow."

Rattrap takes his seat.

"Sorry I'm late Wheels, I had ta help Ramulu=
s get Nightshift inta the med bay."

Tucson nods.

"That's all right, I und=
erstand.  Now as far as the escaped enemy forces, I'd like to send Silverbo=
lt with Kup to the ship's parameter to see if you pick up on their signatur=
es.  Once they've determined the path of the escaped predicons, I'd like a =
full report and please, try not to take them on your own.  Call for backup =
the minute you find them.  I worry about all of you, and if Anything ever h=
appened to anyone of you, I'd never forgive myself.  "

He sighs.

" No one=
 has the right to control what isn't theirs to govern.  Freedom is the righ=
t of all sentient beings and the right of creatures who were born Naturally=
 to this planet.  Leo Prime, I vote we take care of the perpetrator togethe=
r.  He seems to need a taste of his own medicine."
